revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ice Path |image = [[File:Ice Path.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Ice Path. |tokens = 6,000 |location = Between Route 44 and 45, north of Blackthorn City. }} '''Ice Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 120,400 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Jynx.png|40px]] Jynx |- | [[File:Swinub.png|40px]] Swinub |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Delibird.png|40px]] Delibird || <center> 440,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% || rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.07% || 13.86% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 10.42% || 11.07% || 13.86% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.22% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || 1.18% || 450 Clears |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% || rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 12.11% || 12.11% || 12.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% || rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Protein}} || N/A || 0% || 0% || <0.01% || 450 Clears |}
